title: What the hell
body: I just had promos for Silver 1 , i lost the previous promo so i had a free win this time . So i started playing another game i lost it so its 1 win and 1 lose , another game to play right? I win the other game and i'm silver 2 with 98 lp. this is not the first time this happens to me ..is it a bug or? I should be silver 1 with 2 wins 1 lose in promos...can someone explain please

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it seems that you had a queue dodge during your series.  Unfortunately, queue dodging will disqualify your promo helper.  I know it's not the best news, but I hope it helps clear things up for your next matches.  Best of luck!
